title: [PATCH] Auto-deploy script for polly bot fixed
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.summary: Updates the Polly bot deployment workflow with enhanced logging and corrected directory paths.
gist.impact: Ensures more reliable and transparent automated deployments for the Polly bot.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot performing maintenance on a robotic parrot (Polly) in a cozy server room setting.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot adjusting a small robotic parrot in a server room. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixelated cables and logs. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee mascot adjusting a small robotic parrot in a server room. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixelated cables and logs. Nostalgic but beautiful.
